name: 1st International Conference on Engineering, Social- Sciences, And Humanities (IC-ESSU)
content: 1st International Conference on Engineering, Social- Sciences, And Humanities (IC-ESSU) which is scheduled to take place on the 26th and 27th of May, 2021 in the Eastern Samar State University - Borongan Campus, Philippines in Association with the Institute for Engineering Research and Publication (IFERP). IC-ESSU will offer researchers, delegates and scholars an incredible chance to interact with each other and share their experience and knowledge of technology application.
